DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_TH_NOTE_1: All the fires must be lit. It will try to stop you.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_TH_NOTE_2: Light the fire. Go to where the loop began.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_TH_NOTE_3: Do not let it catch you. It could be anywhere.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_BH_NOTE_1: Light the fire. The lanterns will guide your path.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_CT_NOTE_1: Get to the escape pod crash site.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_CT_NOTE_2: Light the fire and come, quickly
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_GD_NOTE_1: You must be seeing things, maybe you should <![CDATA[<color=orange>doze off</color>]]>, get some rest.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DW_NOTE_1: Go to the secret room in the party house.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DW_OTHER_NOTE_1: This is not the right place.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DB_1: Hey it's me Ernesto, the magic talking anglerfish!
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DB_2: You eating some weird marshmallows or what.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DB_3: Lay off the sap wine, hatchling.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_AG_1: What an unfortunate universe to exist in.

UIDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_POPUP:
Thank you for installing Dreamstalker! This should only be played after beating the main game and DLC.

Something is different in the solar system, search for notes to find answers.
UIDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_RETRY_TEXT: This will restart the current level.
UIDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_QUIT_TEXT:
Quit to main menu?

Your progress will be saved.
